titlestmt.titleproper: Miscellaneous historical and genealogical materials undated
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012

did.repository: The Historical Society of Pennsylvania 1300 Locust Street Philadelphia, PA 19107

scopecontent.p: This is a "collection" of miscellaneous, mostly printed, items. Examples of items include: a transcript of birth, marriage, and death records from Zion's Evangelical Lutheran Church (Perry Township, Berks County, Pennsylvania), 1908-1940; a copy of Bruno Roselli, The Italians in Colonial Florida, 1513-1821 (published in 1940); and a copy of Saint Anne's: 100 Years. There is a list in the box.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

otherfindaid.p: An inventory is available in the repository.
